source:
TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_SEQ_00Regitt is eyeing the distance nervously.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
※本クエストは受注時のクラスでのみ進行します。

ワッツハンマー・ガレージのレギットは、グレムリンの接近を警戒しているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_TODO_00<tab>Lay traps in the Forest of the Lost Shepherd.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_TODO_00迷える羊飼いの森のに
を仕掛ける

source: TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_001<tab>Bugger me silly! When we came here, no one had the courtesy to tell us these gremlins would be even more of a pain in the arse than hobgoblins! Just imagining those bug-eyes and mangy fur gets my blood boiling something fierce.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_001はぁ～……まったく困ったラリ。
レイクランドには、ホブゴブリン以上の難敵がいたラリ！
ギョロ目の白い魔物、グレムリンのことラリよ！！

source: TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_002<tab>As if their incessant chattering wasn't enough of a nuisance, the soldiers at the Ostall Imperative tell me they have a natural curiosity for machinery─a curiosity that ends with the machines in a pile of scrap more often than not.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_002なんでも、オスタル厳命城の衛兵さんが言うには、
グレムリンには、機械を狂わせる習性があるらしいラリ！
そんな魔物が、ガレージに近づいたら大変ラリ！！

source: TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_003<tab>Needless to say, we can't suffer an infestation of those vermin. That's why, with the help of those aforementioned soldiers, I've built these traps to keep them at bay. Go ahead and lay them around for me, would you?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_003そこで、衛兵さんから教わった「」ラリ！
用意したこいつを、奴らが通ってくる森のほうに、
ガレージに近づかないよう、仕掛けてきてほしいラリ～！

TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_GREMLIN03905_000_012(-こそこそグレムリン-)ヒッ！
アイツラ、クル～！
TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_GREMLIN03905_000_013<tab>(-ひそひそグレムリン-)ニゲロ～！

source: TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_020<tab>From the looks of things, it seems the traps were as effective as I was led to believe. That ought to keep those pests out of our beards for the time being.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_020おつかれさまラリ！
これでしばらくは、あいつらを遠ざけられるラリ～！！

source: TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_021<tab>To think that the sight of mere sweets would inspire such fear in the gremlins. If what the soldiers told me is true, however, it's not the sweets themselves that are dangerous so much as what they herald: pixies!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_021あの忌避剤は、なんてことのない飴玉ラリ。
レイクランドでは、飴玉を野外に放置しておくと、
甘味好きのピクシー族がよってくるって伝承があるらしいラリ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_022<tab>Legend has it that if you spot candy in the wild, those winged hoodwinkers will be nearby. And for all the gremlins' penchant for trickery, even they wouldn't dare get between a pixie and their confectionary. Perhaps when I set the traps next, I'll stay behind to see if the stories are true.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA104_03905_REGITT_000_022イタズラ好きのグレムリンも、ピクシー族には絶対に勝てないラリ。
だから、飴玉を見るだけで、恐れをなして逃げるラリね！
また現れるようになったら、お願いするラリよ！
